statements: DELETE FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patents WHERE approval_status = 'Pending' AND filing_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe' AND approval_status = 'Rejected';
DELETE FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Legal Agreement' AND document_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patents WHERE id = 100 AND inventor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM inventors WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patent_rights WHERE investor_id = 100 AND license_type = 'Exclusive';
DELETE FROM patent_history WHERE event_type = 'Filed' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
